desc: Cultists include any groups of like-minded individuals pledged to serve a mysterious power that might or might not be a god. Many cults, in fact, venerate the Demon Lord in one of its many aspects without realizing their work advances the aims of this terrifying power.
name: cultist

talent.name: Mad Certainty
talent.desc: When a cultist makes a challenge roll or an attack roll, it can make the roll with 1 boon. On a failure, the cultist takes 1d6 damage.

desc: Acolytes of the New God travel the lands of the Empire, working to combat corruption's spread and fight agents sworn to the Demon Lord.
name: Acolyte of the New God
prof: Acolyte of the New God plus one language.

action.name: Prayer
action.desc: When a creature within short range of the acolyte makes a challenge roll or an attack roll, the acolyte can use a triggered action to grant 1 boon to the triggering roll. An attack roll with a weapon deals 1d6 extra damage.

equip: A dose of holy water and a holy symbol.

desc: Initiates of the Old Faith worship the Elder Gods and safeguard the land. Most live on the edges of towns or in the depths of the wilderness, where they can commune with the spirits of nature and perform their rites without interference.
name: initiate of the Old Faith
prof: Academic (nature) plus one of the following:
list: Astrology / Folklore / Geography / Medicine / or Religion

talent.name: Animal Friendship
talent.desc: In social situations, the initiate makes attack rolls to influence animals with 1 boon.

action.name: Prayer
action.desc: When a creature within short range of the initiate makes a challenge roll or an attack roll, the initiate can use a triggered action to grant 1 boon to the triggering roll. An attack roll with a weapon deals 1d6 extra damage.

equip: A healing potion and a holy symbol.

desc: On civilization's frontiers, witches act as healers, advisors, and wisdoms, lending their expertise to helping their neighbors overcome challenges the wilderness presents.
name: apprendice witch
prof: Academic (nature) plus one of the following:
list: Astrology / Folklore / Geography / Medicine / or Religion

action.name: Prayer
action.desc: When a creature within short range of the witch makes a challenge roll or an attack roll, the witch can use a triggered action to grant 1 boon to the triggering roll. An attack roll with a weapon deals 1d6 extra damage.

equip: A holy symbol and a incantation of a rank 0 spell.

desc: At the center of every cult stands a high cultist, the leader of the deranged band. Such individuals usually possess strong and magnetic personalities that attract the weak-willed and unstable. High cultists possess true power, sometimes gained by bargaining with devils or from encounters with demonic relics, and they use that power to impress, coerce, and corrupt the people who follow them.
name: high cultist

talent.name: Mad Devotion
talent.desc: When the cultist makes a challenge roll or an attack roll, it can make the roll with 1 boon. On a failure, the cultist gains 1 insanity.

action.name: Necessary Sacrifice
action.desc: One target cultist within short range of the high cultist that is friendly to it takes damage equal to the cultist's Health. The high cultist regains the casting of one spell and may cast it immediately.

equip: Ceremonial robes and a book of forbidden knoledge.
